architectural_elements.name: Stone Walls
architectural_elements.description: Damp, moss-covered stone walls with cracks, water stains, and patches of mold.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Barrels
architectural_elements.description: Large, dusty barrels stacked along the walls, some leaking or marked with strange symbols.

architectural_elements.name: Stone Floor
architectural_elements.description: Uneven, cracked stone flooring with puddles of water or wine stains.

architectural_elements.name: Low Ceiling with Wooden Beams
architectural_elements.description: Dark, rotting wooden beams covered in cobwebs and dust.

architectural_elements.name: Iron Gate or Door
architectural_elements.description: A heavy, rusty iron gate or door at the entrance, creaking ominously when opened.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wine Racks
furniture_and_decor.description: Wooden racks filled with dusty wine bottles, some missing or containing unknown liquids.

furniture_and_decor.name: Tasting Table
furniture_and_decor.description: A small, rickety table with a few glasses, a half-empty decanter, and wine stains.

furniture_and_decor.name: Candlesticks
furniture_and_decor.description: Iron or brass candlesticks with half-melted candles, casting flickering light.

furniture_and_decor.name: Storage Crates
furniture_and_decor.description: Wooden crates filled with corks, broken bottles, or old documents.

furniture_and_decor.name: Hanging Lanterns
furniture_and_decor.description: Rusty lanterns hanging from the ceiling, swaying slightly and emitting dim light.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs draped across the racks, barrels, and ceiling beams.

atmospheric_details.name: Dampness
atmospheric_details.description: Visible moisture on the walls and floor, with puddles forming near the barrels.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: Lanterns or candles casting weak, flickering light, creating long, shifting shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Ghostly Whispers
atmospheric_details.description: Faint whispers, the sound of clinking glasses, or distant murmurs from unseen figures.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Drafts
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden chills near the barrels or door, with visible breath in the air.

interactive_objects.name: Dusty Wine Bottles
interactive_objects.description: Bottles labeled with strange symbols or dates, some containing glowing or blood-like liquid.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: A key hidden behind a barrel, under the tasting table, or inside a crate.

interactive_objects.name: Old Journal
interactive_objects.description: A leather-bound journal tucked between bottles or inside a crate, containing clues or disturbing entries.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A pocket watch left on the tasting table or hidden in a crate, tied to a time-based puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A loose stone in the wall or a false bottom in a barrel, containing a note or small artifact.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Cobwebs or lanterns swaying as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the barrels or door.

environmental_effects.name: Wine Stains
environmental_effects.description: Dark, mysterious stains on the floor or table, hinting at past spills or darker events.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Dust
environmental_effects.description: Dust or mold spores drifting down from the ceiling or shelves.

lighting.name: Lantern Light
lighting.description: Dim, flickering lanterns hanging from the ceiling or placed on the tasting table.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Flickering candles on the table or racks, casting eerie shadows.

lighting.name: Ghostly Glow
lighting.description: A faint, eerie glow emanating from certain bottles or barrels.
